level.text: Subject to ยง 5501.2, a license issued pursuant to this chapter shall expire at 12:00 midnight of June 30 of each odd-numbered year.

If the Director changes the renewal system pursuant to ยง 4006.3 of chapter 40 of this title, a license issued pursuant to this chapter shall expire at 12:00 midnight of the last day of the month of the birth date of the holder of the license, or other date established by the Director.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 36 DCR 632 (January 20, 1989); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 701 (January 26, 2007).
